edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.bc

Class BcTripleDES

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.bc.BcPRP
      • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.bc.BcTripleDES
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrfFixed, PrpFixed, PseudorandomFunction, PseudorandomPermutation, TripleDES

    public final class BcTripleDES
extends BcPRP
implements TripleDES
    Concrete class of prf family for Triple-DES. This class wraps the implementation of Bouncy castle.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)

      Receives random object to use.

      Receives name of random algorithm to use.
